title: Avengers Endgame: 3-Sentence Theory!
body: Cause “The Russos” be playin’: Captain Marvel dies from “The Decimation” by Thanos, and is not coming to the rescue in Avengers 4. She see’s Fury’s page,  and then fades to dust like right when she’s about to fly off. Movie just opens on that lol.

summary: “So as we leave behind our home in space...what’s left of it...I want you all to know that serving with you has been the...
caption:
“So as we leave behind our home in space…what’s left of it…I want you all to know that serving with you has been the greatest honor of my career. Some of you have only been members of Alpha Flight for a short time, others of you have been here with me since the beginning. But between us, we’ve saves teh world more times than I can count, and more than anyone down there will ever know. You’ve sacrificed so much, and through it all you’ve helped me grow as your commander, as your fellow soldier, and as your friend. I’d tell you to go out there and make me proud, but you already have. So, I’ll just say see you back in The Big Apple. And the first Papaya Dog is on me”

The Mighty Captain Marvel (2016) #8 - Band Of Sisters Part 4

blog.name: thefeministherald
blog.title: The Feminist Herald
blog.description: Brief Feminist Updates.  Feminism: Supporting the fight against the oppression of women through activism and the interrogation of the tools used to create and perpetuate a social system that oppresses women in order to afford privilege to men, especially white men. Tools like misogynistic narratives, ideas and attitudes and their use in politics, the media, education and all other social institutions and constructs. In addition, examining and pointing out how racism, homophobia and other oppressive systems and forms of discrimination intersect with misogynistic ideas creating hybrid attitudes, narratives and ideas against women of color, LGBT women, women with disabilities and other women who face those forms of discrimination.

summary: ‘Captain Marvel’: Brie Larson Flies Into Brazil’s Comic Con Experience With New Footage
body:
‘Captain Marvel’: Brie Larson Flies Into Brazil’s Comic Con Experience With New Footage

Fresh off the ’90s superHERo awesomeness of the new Captain Marvel trailer, Brie Larson flew into (not literally, obviously) Brazil’s Comic Con Experience (CCXP) in Sao Paulo to talk about the forthcoming Marvel Studios film.

Larson participated in a panel and also shared footage and an extended trailer from the comic book flick with the packed audience. But if you’re looking for that footage, you probably not going to find it because it was exclusive to CCXP.

However, the Academy Award-winning actress tweeted a video of the crowd which was massive. “Look at these gorgeous humans feeling all the feels with me after watching exclusive footage from #CaptainMarvel,” she wrote.

summary: New Official Still From Captain Marvel Released
title: New Official Still From Captain Marvel Released
body:
Usually when a new trailer is released, the studio will also put out some new stills from the movie. That didn’t happen right away when the new Captain Marvel trailer hit last week, but now Marvel Studios has released one new still from the movie.

It features Carol about to board that train where she’s going to get into a fight with a Skrull disguised as a little old lady:
Marvel Studios’ CAPTAIN…

View On WordPress

blog.name: princeescaluswords
blog.title: "You're Going to Be Driving Me to Eichen House!"
blog.description: Fiction, Teen Wolf, Fandom Insanity, Miscellaneous

title: What nonsense is this?
body:
I thought people were exaggerating.  I really did.  It just goes to show how stupid I can be and that I am a slow learner.

I thought it was an exaggeration when I read that some people thought that the new Captain Marvel movie will fail because “it’s Marvel pushing its SJW Agenda.” 

I thought to myself: “No one can possibly think that the only reason Marvel is making a Captain Marvel movie is to push a political agenda.  That’s insane.”

Nope.  I think I might be.  Because I just saw someone, without irony, claim that is exactly what Marvel is doing.

I’d like to it, but they don’t need my help in spreading their stupidity disease.  I’ll send people the link if they really want it.

Are you serious?

Captains Marvel (Mar-Vell and Carol Danvers) and the Kree-Skrull War have been major parts of the Marvel continuity since before I was born.   I was a teenager when the third Captain Marvel (Monica Rambeau) made her debut.  If making a movie out of it is part of the SJW agenda … I really don’t have a follow up for that statement.  It’s just mind blowing.

I guess I’m just slow.

summary: I honestly don’t think I’ll go see Captain Marvel. I don’t really like Brie as an actress and I’ve not been impressed much with...
question: I honestly don’t think I’ll go see Captain Marvel. I don’t really like Brie as an actress and I’ve not been impressed much with the trailers either 😩
answer: I’ve learned to not take a trailer for what it is. Sometimes sadly that’s all the interesting parts. Sometimes they aren’t. I’m definitely watching it, not just for Brie or anything but I’m tired of watching only male-led superhero films. I want to see my ladies succeed. 😉

reblog.comment: I’ve learned to not take a trailer for what it is. Sometimes sadly that’s all the interesting parts. Sometimes they aren’t. I’m definitely watching it, not just for Brie or anything but I’m tired of watching only male-led superhero films. I want to see my ladies succeed. 😉

blog.name: comicsin5panels
blog.title: Comics In 5 Panels
blog.description: I take a comicbook, cut it down to 5 panels, and hope you find it entertaining:)

title: Captain Marvel comics in 5 panels.
body:
Captain Marvel, you might be a Superman ripoff, but I still love ya!

Actually, it is the other way around, despite what DC Comics would like you to believe. DC sued Fawcett Comics for me being to similar to Superman, but the truth is that DC changed Superman so he became more like me, such as making him a “boy scout”.

Eh? Dude, what are you talking about? You are super-strong, invulnerable, you can fly-

The power of flight, one of the abilities I that I bestowed on Billy Batson, was something the Last Son of Krypton did not have back in 1939. He could only jump.

What? Really?

Indeed, you shade-wearing simpleton. And I, Doctor Sivana, was the enemy of the Big Red Cheese a year before the buffoon Luthor came to be!

And I’m actually one of the first female counterparts to a male superhero. I entered comics seventeen years before Supergirl did. Also, Supergirl was created by Otto Binder who made me as well.

So, wait… You are telling me that DC ripped off Captain Marvel in order to turn Superman into the beloved character we know today, and then SUED Fawcett Comics… accusing Cap Marvel of being to similar to Sups?

Yes.

… Dude… Not cool.
